src:
Hujan Mulai Turun Merata, Pintu Air Jakarta Terpantau Aman
04 Nov 2019, 08:05 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Hasil pemantauan BPBD DKI Jakarta mengungkap tinggi muka air (TMA) di sejumlah pintu air di kawasan DKI Jakarta, pada Senin pagi dalam status siaga IV atau aman (CNN Indonesia/ Safir Makki)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Badan Penanggulangan Bencana Daerah (BPBD) DKI Jakarta menyatakan bahwa tinggi muka air (TMA) di sejumlah pintu air di kawasan DKI Jakarta, pada Minggu malam dalam status siaga IV atau aman.Berdasarkan akun twitter @BPBDJakarta yang dipantau Senin pagi (4/10), tinggi muka air pada pukul 21.00 WIB Pintu Air Manggarai mencapai 550 cm atau berstatus siaga IV.Kemudian, pintu air Karet mencapai 270 cm, Pos Krukut Hulu (50 cm), Pesanggrahan (95 cm), Angke Hulu (30 cm), Waduk Pluit (-195 cm), Pasar Ikan (152 cm), pos Cipinang Hulu (120 cm), Sunter Hulu (120 cm), dan pintu air Pulo Gadung mencapai 330 cm yang juga berstatus aman.Pada waktu sama, ketinggian di Bendung Katulampa, Kota Bogor, Jawa Barat, mencapai 30 cm, dan Pintu Air Depok mencapai 70 cm yang juga berstatus aman.Secara terpisah, Badan Meteorologi, Klimatologi dan Geofisika (BMKG) memprediksi Jakarta Utara dan Kepulauan Seribu akan mengalami hujan ringan pada Senin (4/11) dini hari, sementara wilayah lainnya akan berawan hingga berawan tebal.Suhu udara di Jakarta secara umum berada pada temperatur antara 23 hingga 33 derajat Celsius, dengan kelembapan udara antara 60 hingga 95 persen.(ANTARA/gil)
text:
Rain Begins Evenly, Jakarta's Gate is Monitored Safely
04 Nov 2019, 08:05 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


The results of monitoring by DKI Jakarta BPBD revealed the water level (TMA) in a number of water gates in the DKI Jakarta area, on Monday morning in the status of standby IV or safe (CNN Indonesia / Safir Makki)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - The Jakarta Regional Disaster Management Agency (BPBD) states that the water level (TMA) at a number of water gates in the DKI Jakarta area, on Sunday night is on IV alert status or safe. Based on the @BPBDJakarta Twitter account monitored Monday morning (4/10), the water level at 21.00 WIB Manggarai Water Gate reaches 550 cm or the status of standby IV. Then, the Rubber water gate reaches 270 cm, Krukut Hulu Post (50 cm), Pesanggrahan (95 cm), Angke Hulu (30 cm), Pluit Reservoir (-195 cm), Fish Market (152 cm), Cipinang Hulu post (120 cm), Sunter Hulu (120 cm), and Pulo Gadung floodgates reach 330 cm which are also safe. At the time the same, the height in Bendung Katulampa, Bogor City, West Java, reaches 30 cm, and Depok Water Gate reaches 70 cm which is also safe. Separately, the Meteorology, Climatology and Geophysics Agency (BMKG) predicts North Jakarta and the Thousand Islands will experience rain. light on Monday (4/11) morning, while other regions it will be cloudy to thick cloudy. Air temperatures in Jakarta are generally at temperatures between 23 to 33 degrees Celsius, with humidity between 60 and 95 percent. (ANTARA / gil)
